Desc.eng: I have disturbing news. The Professor is turning the whole city upside down for us. He even sent his minions down into the tunnels.
Or we could make preparations. If you clear out the maze, I could build you some deadly traps.
They will find us eventually. We should strike first.
You’ll find some ancient traps in the sewers from the old times. I can build those if you get me the parts. The deadliest devices will cost more material and time.
Fine. I’ll clear out the tunnels then.
I can’t deploy the traps until you clear out the tunnels.
Fine. I’ll clear out the tunnels then.
You had me at deadly. Great idea! What types of traps?
